articles.title: Ligue 1: Lionel Messi suffers first defeat with PSG at Rennes; Marseille lose to Lille

articles.title: Rugby-Weary Pumas need rest says Ledesma after Argentina struggle
articles.description: The Pumas went into the game on the Gold Coast without six players who were sidelined for breaching pandemic protocols on an unsanctioned day trip to Byron Bay. With injuries and fatigue taking their toll on a weary Argentina side that has not played a home test in two years, a makeshift team went on to lose 32-17 to the Wallabies.
articles.content: Argentina endured a difficult finish to a challenging Rugby Championship on Saturday with defeat at the hands of Australia, but coach Mario Ledesma praised the character shown by his team at the end of an arduous tour. The Pumas went into the game on... [1904 chars]

articles.title: Wallabies defeat Argentina in final game of Rugby Championship, Andrew Kellaway hat-trick
articles.description: Classy back Andrew Kellaway scored a hat-trick of tries as the Wallabies finished their Rugby Championship campaign with a 32-17 win over Argentina on Saturday night.
articles.content:
An Andrew Kellaway hat-trick inspired the Wallabies to their fourth consecutive win at Cbus Super Stadium on Saturday evening.

articles.description: Andrew Kellaway is on the cusp of breaking Israel Folau's record for most Wallabies tries in a debut season after crossing three times in a win over Argentina.
articles.content:

articles.title: Match Report - Argentina 17 - 32 Australia
